mapper.sql: 0 temp, ftotal totalflow, rtotal ftotalflow, flow, 0 flowerror, 0 esignal, 0 depdata, 0 ME, signal_intensity Signal_strength, time I_time,0 speed, 0 currentV, 0 currentI, 0 pressError, ftotal-rtotal ntotalflow, 0 lastConnecting
time, ftotal totalflow, rtotal ftotalflow, flow, time I_time,0.0 press,ftotal-rtotal totalflowN
mapper.select:
select
from wt4200GprsData where flowId = #{num} order by time desc limit 1

select
from wt4200GprsData where flowId = #{num} order by time desc limit 1
select from wt4200GprsData where flowId = #{criteria.meterId} and date(time) = date(#{criteria.currentTime}) and hour(time) = hour(#{criteria.currentTime}) order by time desc limit 1

select I_time, CASE WHEN e IS NOT NULL THEN 0.0 ELSE NULL END aa, CASE WHEN e IS NOT NULL THEN 0.0 ELSE NULL END ab, CASE WHEN e IS NOT NULL THEN 0.0 ELSE NULL END ac,e,f,g,firstTotalflow,ifnull(firstTotalflow2,lastTotalflow), case when firstTotalflow is null then null when firstTotalflow2 is null then lastTotalflow-firstTotalflow else firstTotalflow2-firstTotalflow end increaseTotalflow from( select date_format(time,'%d') I_time,0 aa,0 ab,0 ac,avg(flow) e,max(flow) f,min(flow) g, (select ftotal from wt4200GprsData where flowId = #{criteria.meterId} and date(time) = #{criteria.currentDate} order by time limit 1) firstTotalflow, (select ftotal from wt4200GprsData where flowId = #{criteria.meterId} and date(time) = #{criteria.currentDate} order by time desc limit 1) lastTotalflow, (select ftotal from wt4200GprsData where flowId = #{criteria.meterId} and date(time) = date_add(#{criteria.currentDate}, INTERVAL 1 day) order by time limit 1) firstTotalflow2 from wt4200GprsData where flowId = #{criteria.meterId} and date(time) = #{criteria.currentDate}) t

select b.data - a.data as dif, a.data as sta, b.data as enda from ((select ftotal as data from wt4200GprsData where flowId = #{num} and time >= #{startTime} and time <= #{endTime} order by time asc limit 1) union (select 0.0 as data) limit 1) as a, ((select ftotal as data from wt4200GprsData where flowId = #{num} and time >= #{startTime} and time <= #{endTime} order by time desc limit 1) union (select 0.0 as data) limit 1) as b
SELECT date_format(time,'%H') dh,${column} FROM wt4200GprsData where flowid= #{num} and time >= #{start} and time <= #{end} group by date_format(time,'%y-%m-%d %H') order by dh asc

select *, ${num}, (t2.todaymaxval-t3.todayminval)/t2.todaymaxval todayswing from (SELECT ${num} hismaxnum,i_time hismaxi_time, ${column} hismaxval from (SELECT flow,time i_time,0.0 press FROM wt4200GprsData where flowid=#{num}) t group by ${column} desc limit 1) t left join (SELECT ${num} hisminnum,i_time hismini_time, ${column} hisinval from (SELECT flow,time i_time,0.0 press FROM wt4200GprsData where flowid=#{num}) t1 group by ${column} asc limit 1) t1 on t.hismaxnum=t1.hisminnum left join (SELECT ${num} todaymaxnum,i_time todaymaxi_time, ${column} todaymaxval from (SELECT flow,time i_time,0.0 press FROM wt4200GprsData where flowid=#{num}) t2 where i_time >= #{start} and I_time <= #{end} group by ${column} desc limit 1) t2 on t1.hisminnum=t2.todaymaxnum left join (SELECT ${num} todayminnum,i_time todaymini_time, ${column} todayminval from (SELECT flow,time i_time,0.0 press FROM wt4200GprsData where flowid=#{num}) t3 where i_time >= #{start} and I_time <= #{end} group by ${column} asc limit 1) t3 on t2.todaymaxnum=t3.todayminnum limit 1

select ${num},x.i_time xtime,x.${column} xval,x1.i_time x1time,x1.${column} x1val,t.i_time ttime,t.${column} tval,date_add(t.I_time,interval -1 day) ntime from (select x.i_time,x.${column} from (SELECT flow,time i_time,0.0 press FROM wt4200GprsData where flowid=#{num}) x, (SELECT i_time, ${column} fROM (SELECT flow,time i_time,0.0 press FROM wt4200GprsData where flowid=#{num}) t group by i_time desc limit 1) t where x.i_time > date_add(t.I_time,interval -1 day) order by i_time asc limit 1) x, ((select x.i_time,x.${column} from (SELECT flow,time i_time,0.0 press FROM wt4200GprsData where flowid=#{num}) x, (SELECT i_time, ${column} lowval fROM (SELECT flow,time i_time,0.0 press FROM wt4200GprsData where flowid=#{num}) t group by i_time desc limit 1) t where x.i_time < date_add(t.I_time,interval-1 day) order by i_time desc limit 1) union all (select now() ntime, 0.0 ${column}) limit 1) x1, (SELECT i_time ,${column} fROM (SELECT flow,time i_time,0.0 press FROM wt4200GprsData where flowid=#{num}) t group by i_time desc limit 1) t limit 1

select ${num},x.i_time xtime,x.${column} xval,x1.i_time x1time,x1.${column} x1val,t.i_time ttime,t.${column} tval,date_add(t.I_time,interval -1 month) ntime from (select x.i_time,x.${column} from (SELECT flow,time i_time,0.0 press FROM wt4200GprsData where flowid=#{num}) x, (SELECT i_time, ${column} fROM (SELECT flow,time i_time,0.0 press FROM wt4200GprsData where flowid=#{num}) t group by i_time desc limit 1) t where x.i_time > date_add(t.I_time,interval -1 month) order by i_time asc limit 1) x, ((select x.i_time,x.${column} from (SELECT flow,time i_time,0.0 press FROM wt4200GprsData where flowid=#{num}) x, (SELECT i_time, ${column} lowval fROM (SELECT flow,time i_time,0.0 press FROM wt4200GprsData where flowid=#{num}) t group by i_time desc limit 1) t where x.i_time < date_add(t.I_time,interval-1 month) order by i_time desc limit 1) union all (select now() ntime, 0.0 ${column}) limit 1) x1, (SELECT i_time ,${column} fROM (SELECT flow,time i_time,0.0 press FROM wt4200GprsData where flowid=#{num}) t group by i_time desc limit 1) t limit 1

select ${num},x.i_time xtime,x.${column} xval,x1.i_time x1time,x1.${column} x1val,t.i_time ttime,t.${column} tval,date_add(t.I_time,interval -7 day) ntime from (select x.i_time,x.${column} from (SELECT flow,time i_time,0.0 press FROM wt4200GprsData where flowid=#{num}) x, (SELECT i_time, ${column} fROM (SELECT flow,time i_time,0.0 press FROM wt4200GprsData where flowid=#{num}) t group by i_time desc limit 1) t where x.i_time > date_add(t.I_time,interval -7 day) order by i_time asc limit 1) x, ((select x.i_time,x.${column} from (SELECT flow,time i_time,0.0 press FROM wt4200GprsData where flowid=#{num}) x, (SELECT i_time, ${column} lowval fROM (SELECT flow,time i_time,0.0 press FROM wt4200GprsData where flowid=#{num}) t group by i_time desc limit 1) t where x.i_time < date_add(t.I_time,interval-7 day) order by i_time desc limit 1) union all (select now() ntime, 0.0 ${column}) limit 1) x1, (SELECT i_time ,${column} fROM (SELECT flow,time i_time,0.0 press FROM wt4200GprsData where flowid=#{num}) t group by i_time desc limit 1) t limit 1

select ${num},x.i_time xtime,x.${column} xval,x1.i_time x1time,x1.${column} x1val,t.i_time ttime,t.${column} tval,date_add(t.I_time,interval -1 year) ntime from (select x.i_time,x.${column} from (SELECT flow,time i_time,0.0 press FROM wt4200GprsData where flowid=#{num}) x, (SELECT i_time, ${column} fROM (SELECT flow,time i_time,0.0 press FROM wt4200GprsData where flowid=#{num}) t group by i_time desc limit 1) t where x.i_time > date_add(t.I_time,interval -1 year) order by i_time asc limit 1) x, ((select x.i_time,x.${column} from (SELECT flow,time i_time,0.0 press FROM wt4200GprsData where flowid=#{num}) x, (SELECT i_time, ${column} lowval fROM (SELECT flow,time i_time,0.0 press FROM wt4200GprsData where flowid=#{num}) t group by i_time desc limit 1) t where x.i_time < date_add(t.I_time,interval-1 year) order by i_time desc limit 1) union all (select now() ntime, 0.0 ${column}) limit 1) x1, (SELECT i_time ,${column} fROM (SELECT flow,time i_time,0.0 press FROM wt4200GprsData where flowid=#{num}) t group by i_time desc limit 1) t limit 1
SELECT ${column} FROM wt4200GprsData where flowid= #{num} and time >= #{start} and time <= #{end} order by time asc limit 1

select end.totalflow - start.totalflow from (select ftotal as totalflow from wt4200GprsData where flowId = #{num} and date(time) = date(now()) order by time asc limit 1) start, (select ftotal as totalflow from wt4200GprsData where flowId = #{num} and date(time) = date(now()) order by time desc limit 1) end

select
FROM wt4200GprsData WHERE flowId = #{num} AND date_format(time , '%Y%m%d%H') = ( SELECT date_format( date_add(time , INTERVAL - 1 DAY) , '%Y%m%d%H') FROM wt4200GprsData WHERE flowId = #{num} ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1) LIMIT 1

select
from wt4200GprsData where flowId = #{num} order by time desc limit ${startIndex},1

SELECT IFNULL( lastMonthTotalflow,0),IFNULL(currentMonthTotalflow,lastMonthTotalflow), currentMonthTotalflow - lastMonthTotalflow increaseMonthTotalflow FROM ( SELECT (SELECT ftotal-rtotal FROM wt4200GprsData WHERE flowId = ${num} AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM time)=#{year} AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM time) = #{month } ORDER BY TIME DESC LIMIT 1) currentMonthTotalflow, (SELECT ftotal-rtotal FROM wt4200GprsData WHERE flowId = ${num} AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM time)=#{year} AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM time) = #{lastmonth } ORDER BY TIME DESC LIMIT 1) lastMonthTotalflow FROM wt4200GprsData WHERE flowId = ${num} ORDER BY TIME DESC LIMIT 1 ) t
